circumstances: In the evening, the intoxicated crew departed Yartsevo on an unauthorized flight to Novy Gorodok. Few minutes after takeoff, while cruising by night, the single engine aircraft collided with a 14 metres high lone tree in a forest clearing located some 35 km southwest of Yartsevo. The aircraft lost height and crashed 121 metres further, bursting into flames. Both pilots were killed.
probable_cause: Collision with trees while the intoxicated crew was flying at an insufficient altitude by night.
